thread.section_title: Snowgoose Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Snowgoose | snowgoose.com.au
thread.title: Anne

author: Anne
title: Anne
text: It is lovely to send and receive flowers, but extra fresh fruit is wonderful especially to a couple or a male or to a work group or small company. The fruit is always just not quite ripe so it lasts, it is beautifully packaged and presented and it is healthy. I have used Snowgoose for many years and have never been let down. The staff are always helpful when I call with my big Christmas order.. Wish there were more companies like them.
